alert.note: Alert for Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 9:04PM PST until February 23 at 6:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph for tonight through Wednesday. * WHERE...Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...With the low snow levels, snowfall could impact travel on portions of the Ortega Highway on Wednesday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
